title: Start or Sit (NFC)! Lance/Hill/Huntley; Eagles RBs; Cardinals RBs (12/31 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Let's start with some Fill in the Blank! We would start Trey Lance/Tyler Huntley/Taysom Hill over ____ (2:00). The stud RB we're concerned about is ____ (8:00). We would start Darrel Williams over ____ (8:40). The WR we like but don't love is ____ (11:30) ... Any concerns about the weather this weekend (15:00)? Also, your news and notes (19:40) and One Question for Each Game (26:00) as we discuss D.J. Moore, Ezekiel Elliott, Aaron Jones, Brandon Aiyuk and Antonio Gibson ... Start or Sit for Cardinals-Cowboys (34:30), Lions-Seahawks (43:10), Vikings-Packers (52:00), Bucs-Jets (57:15), Eagles-Football Team (59:40), Texans-49ers (1:08:00), Panthers-Saints (1:13:50) and Giants-Bears (1:16:40) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/fantasyfootballtoday
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
You can listen to Fantasy Football Today on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast."
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Start or Sit (NFC)! Lance/Hill/Huntley; Eagles RBs; Cardinals RBs (12/31 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Talking Eagles RBs, Cowboys RBs, Antonio Gibson, Rashaad Penny, Trey Lance, Taysom Hill, Tyler Huntley, D.J. Moore, Kyler Murray, Kirk Cousins and many more!
